long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create flashcards to learn content from any website using Weaver School's AI powered flashcard maker. Just select the text from the page you want to convert into flashcards, and our chrome extension will create flashcards for you automatically, complete with translations, AI images, AI voice pronunciation examples, romanized spellings, and much more.
